content:
get egg-static for april 1st!

Sign up now for our 4th annual Great Easter Rate Hunt, your chance to score one of 80+ incredible discounts (including $1.00 Ocean Front rooms)!                                                                                                                                            What is The Great Easter Rate Hunt?                                  Basically, it's like an Easter egg hunt, but with super cheap hotel rates! Every year on Easter Sunday, we host an online competition where registered participants hunt our website for one of 80+ super discounted rates across a variety of rooms (yes, even Ocean Front rooms!), some at $1.00 and others at $99!                          When does the Great Easter Rate Hunt begin?              On Easter morning, we send an email to all registered participants with the official start time!                                How long does the hunt last?                                                It depends! We will announce the end of the competition via Facebook once all 80+ room rates have been booked. In previous years, the hunt has ended in as little as 20 minutes!                                                              What are the rules?                                                                After registering for the competition by joining our email list, you will soon receive an email with rules, tips for success and, on Easter Sunday, the official start time!       How do I register?                                                          Simply join our email list (below) and like us on Facebook! Don't forget to invite your family and friends!        

            We've hiden over 85 rates ranging from $1 to $99
